question:
Example: WBS for Library Management System  
Level 1: Library Management System 
 Level 2: Requirements Analysis 
     – Gather requirements 

     – Document requirements 
    Level 2: System Design 
     – High-level design 
     – Database design 
     – UI design 
    Level 2: Implementation 
     – Develop login module 
     – Develop search module 
     – Develop issue/return module 
    Level 2: Testing 
     – Unit testing 
     – Integration testing 
    Level 2: Deployment 
     – Installation 
     – User training 
    Level 2: Maintenance 
     – Bug fixing 
     – Enhancements 
Diagram (Tree Representation of WBS) 
Online Shopping System 
├── Requirements Analysis 
│   ├── Gather requirements 
│   ├── Create SRS document 
│   └── Validate requirements 

├── System Design 
│   ├── High-level design 
│   ├── Database design 
│   └── UI design 
├── Implementation 
│   ├── User registration module 
│   ├── Product catalog module 
│   ├── Shopping cart module 
│   └── Payment gateway module 
├── Testing 
│   ├── Unit testing 
│   ├── Integration testing 
│   ├── System testing 
│   └── UAT 
├── Deployment 
│   ├── Server setup 
│   ├── Software installation 
│   └── User training 
└── Maintenance 
    ├── Bug fixing 
    └── Updates 
Activity Network 
an activity network is _____
answer:
a graphical representation of a project's tasks, showing their 
dependencies  and  logical  sequence
